name: Fabio Verelst
comment: The Flemish goulash was from another planet. I never understood why they'd put beer in it, but now i wouldn't go without anymore ! The rice pudding fresh from the farm was worth it's â‚¬3.

name: James Knight
comment: This week there were two vegetarian days, so i ordered them both. I found the chicory very bitter, and there was not enough sauce to compensate for it. The vegatarian lasagna was a true succes, would order again ! Both dishes looked and smelled amazing, too bad i don't like bitter food.

name: Karry Omer
comment: First time i ordered here, can recommend ! I'm intolerant to most junkfood so decided to try Real Meal. I must say, all my colleagues at work were jealous. Fast delivery, very fresh food and almost no wrapping involved. I could very tell this person was passionate about cooking :).

name: Jack Naggings
comment: I like the idea here, but the days i ordered food, it was quite underwhelming. Maybe i should be a cook for a week ?

name: Richard Bullock
comment: I will always look back to when my grandmother would cook a fresh Chateau Briand with handcut fries. It was the highpoint of my  week. I've ordered it here, and it almost felt like i was back at grandma's. I know it is supposed to be JuSt FoOd, but for me this was a great experience. The nostalgia hit me. I recommend this Cook to everybody who loves some good old Vlaamse Kost !

name: James Knight
comment: If you're looking for the best Food in Ghent, look no further, you've found it. Perfectly priced, a mix of Asian cultures, the food is to die for. On top of that, you'll feel at home as they go the extra mile to make sure you're enjoying the evening. The expert knowledge of wine and, especially, beers is a definite bonus we won't forget. The fact that it was pouring was long forgotten.

name: James Knight
comment: If you're looking for the best restaurant of Antwerp, look no further,.
